title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: A new report from Jon Peddie Research presents some great news for the PC gaming market: GPU shipments from AIBs for the desktop rigs have increased by 37.4% in the last quarter. When you factor in all desktop PCs and not those custom-built for gaming or sold as-is, GPU shipments increased 16.8% in Q3 2023 compared to the last quarter.PC GPU market share, image credit: Jon Peddie Research.Read more: https://www.tweaktown.com/news/94753/gpu-market-recovers-shipments-up-37-4-in-q3-2023-with-amd-seeing-the-biggest-increase/index.htmlThe graph shows that sales of AMD video cards are growing, but there is a share of integrated video cards.
